info.name: Big World: 1942 - Logistics Mod (No Supply Lines)

property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
notes
property.value:
A mod of the Big World: 1942 game by humbabba, humbabba@gmail.com. With many thanks to the original game and art designers.

A few mods to give some flavor of the enormous logistical challenges involved in waging a world war. Units are identical to those in the original game, except for the changes/additions noted below, mostly related to moving troops/materiel.

This version does not use the supply-line system implemented in the main Big World: 1942 - Logistics Mod game.

Unit changes/additions
Unit Notes

Armour 		Defends at 2 instead of 3.

AA gun 		Can be transported by sea - transport cost is 3, same as armour.

Halftrack 		Land transport. Can carry 1 infantry or 1 artillery up to 2 spaces. Attacks at 0, defends at 1. Can be transported by sea - transport cost is 3.

Submarine 		May submerge before battle. Can move through enemy units (and does not prevent enemy movement). Effects are nullified by presence of an enemy destroyer.

Transport 		Cannot attack or defend. Has no effect on enemy movement. Automatically destroyed in battle if unescorted by combat units.

Paratrooper 		Identical to infantry in all respects except cost (4 PU); can be transported by air transport.

Air transport 		Used for carrying paratroopers into battle. Can transport 1 or 2 paratroopers into enemy territory - no other moves are legal with paratroopers aboard, though may move freely when empty. Must stop at first enemy territory in its path.

Additionally, to shake up operations in the Mediterranean, the island of Crete has been added:

property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Battleships repair at beginning of round
Battleships repair at end of round
